dialogs: So, the guy,
the main guy,
he goes back in time
to try and save his dad
from dying so he doesn't have to
bang his own mom to exist, you know.
That is so interesting.
Yeah.
And then the ancient aliens come back
to challenge the rule of the new aliens.
That sounds really cool.
Yeah.
And then there's this big showdown
between the two alien princes and they
fly in the air and use their mandibles to
see who's more badass.
And then they both die and
the hero guy returns from the past
and reclaims the throne.
I really want to see it, honey.
Yeah.
Phil Dick is such a good writer.
